text: Indian driver of bus 855 SMB 9 L is blind. Flag so many times but he chose to turn a blind eye. Inconsiderate driver. Such disgusting attitude. Hope sbs looks into this.
Always long-wait for bus 123M.  Should provide more services esp during peak hours on week days.
Cover bus terminal next to Vivocity Harbour Front Sentosa etc. Friendly cosy comfy ambience for romantic intimates groups tourists students & families.
This is bus express terminal. Those looking for normal bus should google search Harbourfront Int. It is just at the opposite main road
